name: Traincopter Genesis: Rise of the [Evil Building]
name_original: Traincopter Genesis: Rise of the [Evil Building]
description:
[Evil Building] is bad! A Siegetrain has been sent to demolish it. Your job as a Shieldcopter pilot is to protect it from [Evil Building]'s minions.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to restart game when you lose/win

Music by:

OpenGameArt.org user Centurion_of_war
